page.title: 17SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content: People are{worried}about the{traffic} and{pollution}and believe that the {agricultural land}is too quickly giving way to huge{housing estates}and cheap shops. While the people here believe that the{local government} carries out its various jobs adequately they do not believe there is sufficient concern for individuals. The{fire service}comes from Newton Abbot, the inspection from Torquay,the street light maintenance is based in Kingsteignton, the{education}system is directed from Paignton. There are several primary schools in Newton and most of the villages have retained their schools. There are two secondary schools,{Coombeshead}and Knowles Hill, which has the 6th form provision in the area.The{Devon Constabulary Police are well thought of and supported by the local residents.
